comments.author: darthmaim.6017
comments.body: I don’t know what happened to gw2services, but you can check for new items on gw2treasures.com: https://en.gw2treasures.com/stats/items/new (I still want to make a better page for that…)

comments.author: Sariel V.7024
comments.body: This was my favorite site to go to quickly check out any new items that got added to the game. However, it hasn’t been updated in about a month now. Anyone know what’s going on?
